name: "COTT" - "Don't Eat the Yellow Brick Road" Online Quiz  | 10 Questions

questions.text: How many platforms are in the very beginning of the level?
questions.explanation:
Five.

	Two Snipes land on these platforms.  The platforms sit on a giant platform you begin on.  Don't fall off of this giant platform, or you will be cut into several little pieces!

questions.text: How many targets must you hit at the beginning?
questions.explanation:
Four.

	You must hit four targets using a Snipe.  There are two targets on one side, and two targets on the other side.  The targets are on a giant machine in the area you begin.

questions.text: What is the title of this mojo room?
questions.explanation:
On a Roller.

	The title is "On a Roller."  "Hazardous Habits" is the next level's mojo room and "Rhino Rampage" doesn't exist.  The object of "On a Roller" is to defeat all the enemies in the time limit.

questions.text: What is the color of the water in this level?
questions.explanation:
Green.

	The water is green due to all the muck and junk in the water.  The machines create this nasty water, which is not a good thing to fish!

questions.text: What ability do you learn in this level?
questions.explanation:
Tic-Tac-Toe.

	The ability is called "Tic-Tac-Toe."  Tic-Tac-Toe allows you to jump from wall to wall on certain types of wall to get to a higher location.  You use this for the first time in this level.

questions.text: What new beast do you find in this level?
questions.explanation:
Shellephant.

	You first found the Rhinoroller in previous levels  You will not find the Scorporilla until later.  There is no such thing as an Armordillo.  I made that up.  The Shellephant is a fierce competitor, but his attack is slow.  You should be able to jack him with a Spike.

questions.text: Can you get a combo king with a single Rhinoroller?
questions.explanation:
No.

	It takes 25 hits to make it to the combo king, a number you cannot reach with a single Rhinoroller.  Although Rhinorollers have strong armor, you can attack him after he has been stunned, unlike some other jackable creatures.

questions.text: How many minions must you defeat to get the minion master?
questions.explanation:
Fifty.

	You must defeat more Koo-Alas to get your minion master.  If you receive the minion master, find all spy toilets, and get the combo king in any level, you will get a gold voodoo doll.  If you only get two of these three things it is silver.  If you get one of these it is bronze.  If you get none of these, it becomes a wooden voodoo doll, simply to represent that you have completed the level.

questions.text: Where is the last Spy Toilet located?
options: In the middle of the road
questions.explanation:
Behind some portapotties.

	It is easiest to destroy these portapotties while you are still on a Shellephant.  Shellephants are huge creatures that you can jack.  Shellephants breath fire as their special attack!

questions.text: How many blades must you avoid while you are still on the Shellephant?
questions.explanation:
One.

	You must only avoid one blade.  However, there are other swinging objects you may want to be careful not to hit!  Shellephants are big, but that doesn't mean you won't die on one!
